skillTree.localised_description: There are some deals that it would be extremely unwise to renege onâ€¦
The Bloody-handed God watches over his disciples.
Treason is never straightforward, especially when your every move is watched and reported.

effects.description:
On turn start, Lords have a chance to gain 2 loyalty
	(accompanying Lord)

skillTree.localised_description: The strength of this warrior's attack never wavers for an instance, such is the opprobrium felt for their hated High Elf cousins.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against High Elves

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: Shadowblade is never stuck in combat for long, preferring to disappear only to appear later where he is least expected... or wanted.

ui_effects.localised_text: Explosion does not affect friendly troops

skillTree.localised_description: The greatest assassin amongst the Dark Elves, Shadowblade is a master of deception and disguise.
Shadowblade is a whisper in combat, untouchable by all but the most skilled of opponents.
This potent magical brew, created from Troll blood, Chimera bile, and the heart of a Blackspine Mountain Griffon, is distilled by Crone Hellebron and gifted only to her most trusted servant.

This large ruby throbs and beats like a living heart. Should its bearer be wounded, this crystal shatters into a thousand jagged shards, impaling anyone unfortunate enough to be caught in the vicinity.
Those unfortunates captivated by Shadowblade's spellbinding dance are drawn inextricably to their doom.
So much of war is an art. Over time and with much practice, combat moves can resemble a series of perfectly-rehearsed dance moves.
This being fights dirty, no honour system applies here!
"Stay in one place, gods-damn you!"
Whether a targeted slice to the throat, or a precision stab to the heart, this one knows how to kill!
"The enemy's fear; their blood spilt in the mud â€“ these are the things that sustain me."
This one doesn't just move in the shadows, they *are* the shadowsâ€¦
Those who are fleet of foot can reach the enemy faster.
Always on the lookout for an opening or advantage in battle - somewhere to put the knife inâ€¦
The harder they hit, the more they commit, the easier it is to strike back.
A drawn blade should not be put away until slaked in blood.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: You have to get up very early if you want to beat this one; nothing escapes their keen eye and lightning reflexes.
The forest teaches a warrior not only when to fire but where, which makes a bigger difference.
Although precision in missile combat is something that can be learned, this one was born with a high degree of natural talent.
Even the merest scratch caused by a blade edged with Manbane causes death.
This poison contains a powerful narcotic that drives its victims to delusional insanity.
"I am not here to inspire, I am here to kill - come let us draw blades together!"

effects.description: Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional 3%
Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional 8%
Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: Civilisation requires slaves. It is upon their toil that the future depends.

effects.description: Increase Slave Income action: Slaves generated per turn is increased by an additional 5
Increase Slave Income action: Slaves generated per turn is increased by an additional 10
Increase Slave Income action: Slaves generated per turn is increased by an additional 15

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.description: Vanguard Deployment||This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

enabled_if: Unit has exceeded the murderous prowess value

backgroundSkills.localised_description: No-one has seen Shadowblade's face and lived. Not even Hellebron knows for certain what Shadowblade looks like, and the master that taught him perished long ago by his pupil's blade.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 25% casualties inflicted
